Name: Devil's Manhattan
Ingredients: 30 ml Southern/Louisiana-style whisky liqueur (e.g. Southern Comfort)
3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A sweet Manhattan with a hint of the south.
History: Our Manhattan cocktail page features a detailed history and common variants.
Nutrition: One serving of Devil's Manhattan contains 247 calories
